text: Another MTK question: is it possible to change a parameter into a variable? I'm constructing a hierarchy of models and at the bottom level are differential equations where the parameters are most naturally interpreted as (fixed) parameters, however they are embedded within a larger model where some of those parameters become variables in the larger model. (The challenge comes because the submodels make sense as independent models with parameters and I'd like to be able to use them as such.)
